survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Cloud Storage Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of cloud storage services to understand their satisfaction levels, pain points, and preferences for future improvements.

questions.question_text: Which cloud storage service do you primarily use?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Ensure 'Other' option includes a text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which cloud storage service do you primarily use?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of your primary cloud storage service?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
